instruction: Generate a title for a paper about the given topic.
input: The impact of technology on global economies
output: Global Economies in the Age of Technology: Assessing the Impact

output: The house had thousands of windows that creaked and moaned in the wind.

instruction: Generate alternative names for a new business.
output: Radiant Networking, Brilliant Bridge Solutions, Marvelous Markets, Brilliant Brands International, Limitless Logic, Illuminated Innovations, Splendid Streams, Inc.

instruction: Given a set of instructions, identify the byproducts that can be expected from the instructions.
input: Plant a rose bush in a garden bed.
output: Byproducts: rose buds, petals, leaves, thorns, and roots.

instruction: Given a list of ingredients, come up with an interesting way to cook them.
output: Make a garlic butter sauce by melting the butter and sautéing the garlic until golden. Brush the salmon with the sauce and place it on a sheet tray. Squeeze the lemon juice over the salmon and bake in the oven until cooked through. Serve with a side of your favorite vegetable.

instruction: Given an example of a product, design packaging that is a good fit.
output: The packaging for the granola bar should be bright and eye-catching with a logo and description of the product. The packaging should have a clear window so the product can be seen and the ingredients can be easily identified. The packaging should also have clear nutritional information, a list of ingredients, and any certifications or information about the product.

instruction: Given a set of instructions, come up with a code snippet that performs the instruction.
input: Write a program in Python to print the numbers from 1 to 50.
output:
for i in range(1,51):
    print(i)

instruction: Given a job title, come up with a list of relevant skills the position may require.
output: Social media manager skills: Content creation and editing, analytics and reporting, creative problem solving, collaboration and teamwork, campaign management and marketing, customer service and outreach, digital media production, copywriting and copy editing, data visualization, project management, time management.

instruction: Given a product, come up with a catchy slogan for the product.
output: Brew to Perfection – Make Every Cup Count.

instruction: Given a block of text, come up with a catchy headline that best represents the text.
input: The new coaching program will help you become a better leader and achieve higher professional success.
output: Lead. Succeed. Transform – A Comprehensive Guide To Reach The Top.

instruction: Given a set of instructions, come up with a list of supplies needed to complete the instructions.
output: Supplies needed to build a model car: model car kit, glue, model paint, brushes, sandpaper, craft knife, plastic or wooden parts, tweezers, screwdriver.

instruction: Given a set of characters and a story, write a script for a 1 minute film.
input:
Characters: Two children, a dog
Story: The children learn that their dog is magical.
output:
FADE IN:

EXT. BUSY STREET – DAY

Two children, FRED and SALLY, are laughing and chasing after a brown dog.

FRED
C’mon Fido, let’s go faster!

The children stop running to catch their breath and watch the dog, FIDO, run circles around them.

SALLY
Fido really loves to run!

Suddenly, Fido starts to glow a bright yellow, running faster and dodging obstacles with ease.

FRED
Wow! How did he do that?

Fido looks back at Fred and Sally with a mischievous grin before he darts off the screen.

FADE OUT.

instruction: Given an example of a vehicle, come up with a catchy name for the vehicle.
output: Lightning Rover.

instruction: Given a set of survey results, make a data visualization that summarizes the results.
input: Survey results of the top 10 countries that people visit most.
output: Create a bar graph to portray the top 10 countries that people visit the most. Have each bar represent the percentage of people that visit a particular country. Include a legend to label which each bar represents.

instruction: Report the average temperature in Tokyo during the month of June
output: The average temperature in Tokyo during the month of June is 24.2°C (75.6°F).

instruction: Convert 20 minutes into seconds.
output: 20 minutes * 60 seconds = 1,200 seconds

instruction: Write a creative story about a group of people stuck on an alien planet.
output: The group of people had been stranded on the alien planet for days. Despite their dire situation, they managed to come together to make the most of their difficult circumstances. They used the resources they had to make shelter, tend to gardens, and build makeshift tools - all while learning to survive and thrive in their new environment. They encountered strange creatures, encountered new challenges and problem solved as a team, even forming a makeshift government. As they embraced their new lives, they made the planet their own, adapting to its environment and discovering its hidden secrets. Despite the difficulties, they formed a bond of friendship and respect that could never be broken. They found they could conquer even the most difficult of challenges as long as they worked together.

instruction: Name the common egg laying bird species
output: Common egg-laying bird species include chickens, ducks, geese, quail, ostrich, turkeys, guineafowl, hummingbirds, and pigeons. Some other uncommon egg-laying bird species are flamingos, tinamous, rheas, emus, cassowaries, and kiwis.

instruction: Find the differences between a jaguar and a leopard
output: The main differences between a jaguar and a leopard are size, physical features, habitat, and behavior. Jaguars are much bigger than leopards and they have larger skulls, stockier limbs and shorter tails. Jaguars also reside mainly in jungles and forests, while leopards prefer grasslands and savannahs. In terms of behavior, jaguars are solitary animals and more powerful and aggressive hunters than leopards.

instruction: Name the capital cities in the states of New York and California
output: The capital city of New York is Albany and the capital city of California is Sacramento.

instruction: Generate the atomic number and symbol of five chemical elements
output:
Element | Atomic Number | Symbol 
------- | ------------- | ------ 
Hydrogen |  1 | H
Helium | 2 | He
Lithium | 3 | Li
Beryllium | 4 | Be
Boron | 5 | B

instruction: Translate the following sentences from Spanish
output: I need a glass of wine.

instruction: Name the Spanish verbs used for essential everyday tasks
output: Essential everyday Spanish verbs include hablar (to speak), comer (to eat), beber (to drink), escuchar (to listen), leer (to read), caminar (to walk), escribir (to write), trabajar (to work), vivir (to live), utilizar (to use), and bailar (to dance).
